results.title: Involvement of inhibition of RhoA/Rho kinase signaling in simvastatin-induced amelioration of neuropathic pain.
results.text_hl: Daily intrathecal administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, beginning 3days before @DISEASE_Mandibular_Nerve_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D000080902 @@@nerve injury@@@, completely blocked all these changes in @<m>DISEASE_Jensen_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537568 @@@nerve@@@-ligated @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.
